transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji good afternoon.
Executive: Ji sir, mai Pooja Sharma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Pooja mam, mai apne account me products dekh raha hu.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: Wo products me
jitne bhi humne uh photos banaye hai products ke photos.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Wo sare front side me dikhai nahi de rahe.
Customer: Wo background me kahi chip gaye.
Customer: To aap dekh sakte hai.
Executive: Kya naam hai sir aapki company ka?
Customer: PLC Private Limited, The Next Private Limited. Abhi humne just meeting ki.

Executive: Accha accha.
Executive: Okay.

Executive: Thik hai sir, mai na aapko back call karti hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Product photos not visible on front side.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product photos, account, visibility, call back
